end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores data provided by users for the express purpose of redisplaying. It does not store user data which was not provided through a command. Users may remove their own content without making a data removal request. This cog does not support data requests, but will respect deletion requests.
This is a edited version of the Aikaterna's cog. For support/issues contact Wayrion (718395193090375700)
